function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased risk of contagion due to physical proximity in virtual reality shopping experiences.","Impact":"Potential spread of contagious diseases due to close interaction in virtual shopping environments.","Mitigation":"Implement virtual reality shopping experiences with social distancing measures and limitations on the number of avatars in a virtual space.","Technologies":"Virtual reality social distancing algorithms and virtual space occupancy management tools.","People":"Customers using virtual reality shopping platforms.","Owner":"Virtual reality platform developers."},{"Description":"Potential risk of spreading contagious diseases through direct customer interactions via chatbots on social media platforms.","Impact":"Increased transmission of diseases through close interactions in virtual customer service.","Mitigation":"Implement AI-based chatbots with health screening capabilities and automated responses to minimize direct customer interactions.","Technologies":"AI chatbots with health monitoring features and automated customer service functions.","People":"Social media users interacting with chatbots.","Owner":"Social media companies and chatbot developers."}]}
